metadata.title: CVE-2018-7637 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read inload_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2018-7588. This is in a "16 colors" case, aka case4.

criterions.comment: cimg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
